reference.title: Lesson 13: White Paper Workshop
reference.shortdesc: Lesson 13 has students work with their assigned team on the white paper workshop.

ul.li: Analyze written work from assigned teammates' white paper assignments.

strow.stentry: White paper workshop: Students review and edit their assigned teammates' white paper projects (requires that you first assign students into workshop groups)Because of the length of the white papers and corresponding effort required for students to review them, this workshop is delivered best with no other lectures or topics for the lesson.
